Reviews.Title: “It's ok”
Reviews.Author: alwayslookingaround
Reviews.Content: nice hot shower frills clean hotel friendly staff easy walk metro metro bus bring earplugs hotel quiet guests stayed 5 nights 2 nights happy earplugs road traffic noise nice little pool

Reviews.Title: “Good location but quite noisy...”
Reviews.Author: Coconuts_UK
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed 4 nights location near revolution monument walking distance sites city plus shops restaurants etc chapultepec park noisy night hotel website connection six flags discounted tickets wasnt reception sent partner hotels waiting tickets arrived didnt talking wasted money taxi overall stay ok probably try else return mexico city

Reviews.Title: “A good choice of a hotel when you are on a budget”
Reviews.Author: Travelone75
Reviews.Content: hotel walking distance city centre shopping banks clean housekeeping everyday restaurant main floor offers mexican menus pay 150200 pesos meal lunch dinner internet time cost 50 connected street corner internet cafe cost bring adaptor plugins cost 25 pesos hotelit quiet night occasional loud noises heard elevator staff pleasant hotel expensive charge 90 pesos route normally offer security travel

Reviews.Title: “for Spanish speakers only”
Reviews.Author: Mal_the_Pal_10
Reviews.Content: hotels website dishonest satellite tv remote 6 basic spanish channels sub titles air conditioned central air gift shop childrens pool tiny luggage stored closet light closet required luggage removal retrieval air conditioning windows screens 2nd night counted 17 mosquito bites head neck arms hear nearby shower hole partition flooded bathroom floor shower floor sanitary bathroom window dirty elevator system doesnt properly missing position 2 8 inches leading stubbed toes wireless internet cost 50 hours short range didnt bar door 100 reliable staff rude unhelpful exception 2 english speaking doormen fun desk staff food beverage staff overpriced restaurant unwilling assist customer complementary ice cool beverages ca obtained liquor store street cheaply 5 save wifi spend upgrade nicer property includes internet access redeeming factors pool closes 800 pm decent location price stay unless fluent spanish speaker tight budget
